scripts.test:prod: yarn build && yarn node dist/index.js generate --input-file examples/turf-js/input.ts --output-folder examples/turf-js/plv8ify-dist
scripts.example:hello: yarn esr src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/hello/input.ts --output-folder examples/hello/plv8ify-dist
scripts.example:hello-start_proc: yarn esr src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/hello-start_proc/input.ts --output-folder examples/hello-start_proc/plv8ify-dist --mode start_proc
scripts.example:turf-js: yarn esr src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/turf-js/input.ts --output-folder examples/turf-js/plv8ify-dist
scripts.example:turf-js-distance: yarn esr src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/turf-js-distance/input.ts --output-folder examples/turf-js-distance/plv8ify-dist
scripts.example:mathjs: yarn esr src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/mathjs/input.ts --output-folder examples/mathjs/plv8ify-dist
scripts.example:react-js: yarn esr src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/react-js/input.tsx --output-folder examples/react-js/plv8ify-dist
scripts.example:trackfootball: yarn esr src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/trackfootball/input.tsx --output-folder examples/trackfootball/plv8ify-dist
scripts.example:object-hash: yarn esr src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/object-hash/input.ts --output-folder examples/object-hash/plv8ify-dist
scripts.examples: yarn example:hello; yarn example:hello-start_proc; yarn example:turf-js; yarn example:react-js; yarn example:object-hash; yarn example:turf-js-distance
